allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json for line in sys.stdin: try: obj = json.loads\(line.strip\(\)\) if obj.get\(''type''\) == ''assistant'': msg = obj.get\(''message'', {}\).get\(''content'', ''''\) if isinstance\(msg, list\): for part in msg: if isinstance\(part, dict\) and part.get\(''type''\) == ''text'': print\(part[''text''][:300]\) elif isinstance\(msg, str\): print\(msg[:300]\) except: pass ")
